data.text: Samsung Galaxy S6 and S6 edge are Android smartphones and are marketed by a KOREAN company "SAMSUNG". The S6 and S6 Edge deliver as success to the Galaxy S5. The smartphones were officially realsed in a press conference at Mobile World Congress in March 2015. Alongside the S6, Samsung also unveiled the S6 Edge, a exceptional whose screen is cloaked along the sides of the device which also includes several additional features for the custmers. These smartphones were available for the customers on 10 April 2015 in 20 countries. Although the construction of S6 was altered it included some of the features which were already were in usage in prior models,it has a metal unibody frame and glass backing instead of plastic. The devices also had an improved version of camers, a glistening user interface, support for both major wireless charging standards, and for a mobile payments platform that allows the device to follow suit the magnetic strip from a credit card. The S6 also has other hardware improvements as well, including a 1440p display, a new chip that utilizes a 14 nm FinFET manufacturing process, and an revised fingerprint scanner. The Galaxy S6 and S6 Edge received positive reviews from analyst, who praised the devices ' upgraded build quality over the earlier models . However, Samsung 's decision to remove the ability to stretch their storage or remove the battery was panned as being likely break off to power users, and the S6 Edge was also sweeped for not
